html:
5.29.20  4:49 am   Is there some deeper meaning to your music we all dont understand?

      how much of it do you understand

5.29.20  4:28 am   does traveling make you nervous?

      can be quite calming also, but i guess it depends whether it's a disease year

5.29.20  3:17 am   Can i ask you a question, kinda like this one?

      sure, that would be ok

5.29.20  3:12 am   If I understand previous answers correctly, you have never experienced an album of music where the quality of the songs packaged within was more enjoyable or enhanced as a result of being presented together?

     not that i can recall

      I tend to agree, but i wonder what the solution is, or if it may be possible to overcome the economic or creative challenges and produce an album that is greater than the sum of its parts. Thoughts?

     make it actually more than just songs

5.29.20  2:40 am   what new programs are you learnign

      at this point it's more like i am teaching them to do stuff

5.29.20  1:53 am   why did the font in the question box change

      it was you who changed

5.29.20  1:51 am   any editing advice?

      take out most of the bad parts but leave some of them in, as a surprise

5.29.20  12:48 am   what is your thought process in lyric creation?

      really more of a musical/feeling process than a thought process

5.28.20  11:10 pm   How are you so cool?

      could be a reflection of you

5.28.20  11:02 pm   How do you make the visual effects in your videos? 

      we'll see

5.28.20  10:40 pm   do you think good mental health is something found or learned

      *created*

5.28.20  10:15 pm   How do you feel about puppets

      they're so majestic

5.28.20  10:09 pm   How super is the super bowl?

      it is an ordinary, average bowl

5.28.20  10:07 pm   whats your favourite colour?

      regular

5.28.20  9:10 pm   have you ever been to the circus 

      no

5.28.20  8:42 pm   I'm going through a bad time how to not go insane 

      tell your story

5.28.20  8:39 pm   How do I find my passion 

      go to the store. there's passion everywhere. including at the store

5.28.20  7:47 pm   What exactly is a joke?

      just common sense really

5.28.20  7:32 pm   what's the most tracks you have ever had on a song, and do you remember which song it is?

      i don't wanna talk about it

5.28.20  7:19 pm   are you learning a new software?

      at this point i am teaching it to do stuff

5.28.20  6:28 pm   Why don't you just come out of your alternet dimension 

      i'm trying to bring them all together

5.28.20  6:17 pm   how a person exist and not exist at the same time

      different point of view

5.28.20  5:57 pm   how do i prevent myself from going insane and on a rampage because i cant handle waiting for lego sets

      write some fanfiction about the lego set while you are waiting

5.28.20  4:56 pm   What's it like being so cool

      OH I FEEL ALL KINDS OF NORMALCY AND REGULARNESS COURSING THROUGH MY VEINS

5.28.20  4:37 pm   What are your thoughts on the word "hog"

      a surprisingly small word

5.28.20  3:38 pm   Why were you up ay 1 am answering questions?

      which day, but why are you up at 3:38 pm asking one

5.28.20  2:54 pm   how is bread made?

      it just appears there

5.28.20  2:03 pm   Hey what pushed you to becoming a great song writer?

      the pursuit of science

5.28.20  1:40 pm   have you ever answered a question with "i don't know"

      yes

5.28.20  1:39 pm   How is Existence?

      i give it 100 billion stars. deducted 400 billion for being too good

5.28.20  1:27 pm   why is america stupid please help

      it is famous. being famous often makes you stupid, or at least look stupid

5.28.20  12:38 pm   do you have visions for videos while you write songs?

      sometimes

5.28.20  12:36 pm   where do u get ur inspiration from

      every possible location

5.28.20  12:36 pm   When you write your songs do you start out with an idea in mind

     yes

      or does it show up as you go along?

     the rest of it does

5.28.20  12:19 pm   Which leafy thing do your prefer: tree, bush or shrub? 

      currently looking to develop an all-purpose leafy thing

5.28.20  12:06 pm   what does time mean?

      it's actually a map of space

5.28.20  11:54 am   I find this so I interesting just the videos, and music it has some sort of vibe to it I don't understand but I love it, how long does it take you to make some of this music? 

      let's find out ..........

5.28.20  11:48 am   Why does everything suck so much?

      this is for your own benefit, and enjoyment

5.28.20  11:23 am   when is next song

      ideally, every tuesday or 2 tuesdays

5.28.20  11:04 am   How do you come up with your songs?

     you have to trick the song into thinking it's writing you

      What advice would you give to someone who is out of ideas?

      see if you can get something else besides an idea. this is a good trick because everything generates ideas. so even if you pick a thing that's not an idea, it will still generate ideas. so go ahead and think of something that is definitely and absolutely NOT an idea

5.28.20  10:50 am   what's a good wisdom

      picture a tree in a field

5.28.20  10:28 am   Bill what kinds of program are you learning?

      seems more like making them than learning them at this point

5.28.20  10:25 am   In "just did a bad thing" you wrote the following:
"all the things i'm supposed to do
and the places i'm supposed to go
are cancelled"

     that's out of context because it's taken from a song, and you can't hear any of the melody/music the way you just wrote it

     My question is this: when did you first realise you could predict the future?

      anyone can appear to have predicted the future if you select the right examples

5.28.20  10:15 am   How do you make crazy songs?

      try to make it more normal than any other song that's ever existed before

5.28.20  10:13 am   Why does it feel like there are so many problems that I can't do a thing about?

      this will make it more rewarding when you finally find solutions to them

5.28.20  9:44 am   does writing songs still feel a lot like being in prison?

      more like an escape the room adventure franchise

5.28.20  9:02 am   Where were you when you started the renaissance

      at home, and in the workplace

5.28.20  9:02 am   Half of my spotify playlist is all of your songs and the other half is everything else

      well that seems like a pretty good balance

5.28.20  8:59 am   What do people think is weird about you?

      perhaps the number of legs at a time of my pants i put on

5.28.20  8:40 am   opinion of india

      'opindia'
